data.title: Liberal Arts High School Curriculum Guide
data.meta_description: Our 2021-2022 school year has more offerings than ever! Check out our school curriculum guide.
data.text:
We are family

Students and faculty come together to form a caring family defined by the McAuley spirit.

We are a lifetime advantage

McAuley is a place that empowers girls to use their strong voices and leadership abilities to make a lasting difference in the world we all share.

We are scholars

Learning is personal, and we offer various academic paths to success for the strengths and talents of each student.

We are compassionate

Mother McAuley is committed to the Catholic faith and rooted in Mercy principles, developing young women to respond compassionately to the needs of our community.

We are champions

McAuley's celebrated athletic program offers experienced players the finest platform to finesse their skills and showcase their talents.

We are creative

McAuley's renowned visual and fine arts programs put girls center stage as actresses, musicians, singers, tech crew designers, painters, photographers, sculptors, graphic designers and more.
